alert.note: Alert for Green; Hart; Larue; Marion; Nelson; Taylor (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 12:09PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of south central Nelson, northwestern Green, southeastern Larue, southwestern Marion, east central Hart and northwestern Taylor Counties through 1245 PM EDT/1145 AM CDT/... At 1208 PM EDT/1108 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower with persistent rotation 9 miles east of Munfordville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This gusty shower will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Hart, southwestern Marion, northwestern Taylor, south central Nelson, southeastern Larue and northwestern Green Counties, including the following locations... Wards, Attilla, Stiles, Bloyd, Hudgins, Lobb, Gleanings, Badger, Mac and Eve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This gusty shower may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Green; Hart; Larue; Marion; Nelson; Taylor
